bill.title: Relating To Probation.
bill.description: Makes a housekeeping amendment to clarify that eligibility for probation does not apply to certain drug paraphernalia violations that have been decriminalized. (SD1)

history.action: Prefiled.
Introduced and Pass First Reading
Referred to JUD, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 01-25-18 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, San Buenaventura, Brower, C. Lee, Morikawa, Takayama, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 442-18) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Souki excused (1).
Deferred one day 02-20-18.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Souki excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 4).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-13-18 9:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, K. Rhoads, Gabbard, Kim, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3029) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-23-18.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Harimoto). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 438) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 388).
House Conferees Appointed: Nishimoto Chair; San Buenaventura, Thielen.
Senate Conferees Appointed: Taniguchi Chair; K. Rhoads, L. Thielen.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 609).
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 785).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-24-18 2:00PM in conference room 329.

The House Conference Managers recommend to agree to the Senate Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, San Buenaventura, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reconsideration of action taken on 03-27-18.
Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 693).
House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Onishi, Takumi excused (2).
Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 703).
Transmitted to Governor.
